title: Farmland Birds Eye View
subtitle: 3in Hoop Embroidery on Sweatshirt Fabric
alt: grey fabric in wood hoop with yellow and green fields bordered by trees with a road running down the middle embroidered on it
description:
2023 

In december of 2023 I started an embroidery project, to embroider every bit of a sweatshirt. This is one of the first things I added. It was inspired by many pinterest designs. It's an aerial view of some farm country inspired by upstate new york.
